lyrics: Whatever makes you happy, whatever you want/You're so fuckin' special, I wish I was special
And if I could be who you wanted/If I could be who you wanted/All the time
How come I end up where I started?/How come I end up where I went wrong?
In a jackknifed juggernaut/I am born again
Be a world child, form a circle/Before we all go under
I'll take a quiet life/A handshake of carbon monoxide/And no alarms and no surprises
You are all I need/You're all I need
And one day/I am gonna grow wings/A chemical reaction/Hysterical and useless
Everything/In its right place/Everything/Everything
Dreamers/They never learn/Beyond the point/Of no return
I don't want to be your friend/I just want to be your lover
They love me like I was a brother/They protect me, listen to me
You are the sun and moon and stars are you/And I could never run away from you
I wanna be in a band when I get to heaven/Anyone can play guitar and they won't be a nothing anymore
Karma police, I've given all I can, it's not enough/I've given all I can, but we're still on the payroll
You're living in a fantasy world/This beautiful world
Yesterday's headlines blown by the wind/Yesterday's people in a scatterbrain
Stand up/Sit down/The raindrops, the raindrops, the raindrops, the raindrops
And true love waits/In haunted attics
All your insides fall to pieces/You just sit there wishing you could still make love
